index_terms: CHICAGO MILWAUKEE ST PAUL PACIFIC RAILROAD
summary: An Ordinance authorizing the mayor and city comptroller to execute and acknowledge an instrument granting and conveying to the Chicago, Milwaukee and Puget Sound Railway Company, its successors and assigns, a right of way thirty feet in width across lands of the City of Seattle, for the construction and maintenance of a pipe line to convey water from Rock Creek to the right of way of said railway company.
